# Create and save a quick filter

Learn how to create, customize, and save quick filters for future use.

Quick filters allow you to customize and save a filter for later use. You can save, edit, and delete a filter condition.

1.  Click the Filter icon in the Select Source Components window.
2.  Select Manage Quick Filter in the Quick Filter window. ![Manage quick filter](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/f8c9469e-f19d-4f6c-8607-114c4312b19c?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..WbzXHrHE6U9zCIxCIreDIxxVdFA8V3IUlLG_pOIBDYk)
3.  In the Create Quick Filter pop-up window, add a filter name, search criteria, and operator.
4.  Click Save to save the filter for future use. Alternatively, you can Save and Apply the filter for immediate use.

You can view the saved filters in the quick filter field.
